2974.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|110|309$نَعَمْ|"Yes,|54|127|6412$وَإِنَّكُمْ|and indeed you|121|194|6681$إِذًا|then|50|123|1317$لَّمِنَ|surely (will be) of|135|172|1196$ٱلْمُقَرَّبِينَ|the ones who are brought near."|236|236|2867$

2976.verse: فَأَلْقَوْاْ|So they threw|115|126|10102$حِبَالَهُمْ|their ropes|91|114|12922$وَعِصِيَّهُمْ|and their staffs|122|145|12923$وَقَالُواْ|and said,|80|103|760$بِعِزَّةِ|"By the might|109|132|12924$فِرْعَوْنَ|(of) Firaun,|95|106|2649$إِنَّا|indeed, we|92|176|120$لَنَحْنُ|surely, we|88|256|9746$ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ|(are) the victorious."|159|243|5074$

2979.verse: قَالُوٓاْ|They said,|89|133|101$ءَامَنَّا|"We believe|97|184|78$بِرَبِّ|in (the) Lord|103|190|6704$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds,|124|168|8$

2981.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|86|309$ءَامَنتُمْ|"You believed|109|136|1242$لَهُۥ|in him|58|85|977$قَبْلَ|before|62|89|4626$أَنْ|[that]|60|87|655$ءَاذَنَ|I gave permission|135|162|6706$لَكُمْ‌ۖ|to you.|68|81|207$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, he|91|100|396$لَكَبِيرُكُمُ|(is) surely your chief|157|174|11514$ٱلَّذِى|who|65|82|138$عَلَّمَكُمُ|has taught you|121|138|11515$ٱلسِّحْرَ|the magic,|90|107|955$فَلَسَوْفَ|so surely soon|115|124|12925$تَعْلَمُونَ‌ۚ|you will know.|113|123|212$لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ|I will surely cut off|144|163|6711$أَيْدِيَكُمْ|your hands|93|112|4205$وَأَرْجُلَكُم|and your feet|110|129|4774$مِّنْ|of|50|69|53$خِلَـٰفٍ|opposite sides,|119|129|4940$وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ|and I will surely crucify you|202|391|11517$أَجْمَعِينَ|all."|95|284|1408$

2984.verse: ۞ وَأَوْحَيْنَآ|And We inspired|139|153|4642$إِلَىٰ|to|53|81|118$مُوسَىٰٓ|Musa,|83|111|499$أَنْ|[that]|60|88|655$أَسْرِ|"Travel by night|125|153|11535$بِعِبَادِىٓ|with My slaves,|123|137|11536$إِنَّكُم|indeed, you|97|315|514$مُّتَّبَعُونَ|(will be) followed."|142|360|12929$

2987.verse: وَإِنَّهُمْ|And indeed, they|133|297|5517$لَنَا لَغَآئِظُونَ|(are) surely enraging [to] us,|214|378|12933$

2991.verse: كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus.|77|126|702$وَأَوْرَثْنَـٰهَا|And We caused to inherit them|226|324|12939$بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٲٓءِيلَ|(the) Children of Israel.|175|224|10567$

2991.verse: ka*a`lika⚓Thus.⚓DEM|LEM:*a`lik|MS★wa>aworavona`haA⚓And We caused to inherit them⚓ V|PERF|(IV)|LEM:>aworava|ROOT:wrv|1P★baniY^⚓**(the) Children of Israel.⚓ N|LEM:bunaY~|ROOT:bny|MP|ACC★<isora`^'iyla⚓**(the) Children of Israel.⚓ PN|LEM:<isoraA}iyl|GEN★

2972.verse: That we might follow the magicians if they are the predominant?"

2973.verse: And when the magicians arrived, they said to Pharaoh, "Is there indeed for us a reward if we are the predominant?"

2974.verse: He said, "Yes, and indeed, you will then be of those near [to me]."

2975.verse: Moses said to them, "Throw whatever you will throw."

2976.verse: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."

2977.verse: Then Moses threw his staff, and at once it devoured what they falsified.

2978.verse: So the magicians fell down in prostration [to Allah].

2979.verse: They said, "We have believed in the Lord of the worlds,

2980.verse: The Lord of Moses and Aaron."

2981.verse: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed Moses before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic, but you are going to know. I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will surely crucify you all."

2982.verse: They said, "No harm. Indeed, to our Lord we will return.

2983.verse: Indeed, we aspire that our Lord will forgive us our sins because we were the first of the believers."

2984.verse: And We inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants; indeed, you will be pursued."

2985.verse: Then Pharaoh sent among the cities gatherers

2986.verse: [And said], "Indeed, those are but a small band,

2987.verse: And indeed, they are enraging us,

2988.verse: And indeed, we are a cautious society... "

2989.verse: So We removed them from gardens and springs

2991.verse: Thus. And We caused to inherit it the Children of Israel.

2992.verse: So they pursued them at sunrise.
